General.Name: Asia Cement Corp
General.Description: Asia Cement Corporation engages in the manufacturing and selling cement, clinker, ready-mixed concrete, and cement related products in China, Taiwan, and internationally. It is also involved in reforestation and leasing business. Asia Cement Corporation was incorporated in 1957 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.207, Dunhua South Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
